match.data:
Planet Markup Language Main
1) Print Planets
2) Add PML
3) Add Planet
4) Select Planet
5) Exit
Selection:
PML:

write.data: {Planet}{ Name } rqP40m { #Name } { Mass } 0.04895 {#Mass} { Period} 4.35714 { #Period }{ Gravity } 1.11765 { #Gravity } { Perihelion } 1.24427{ #Perihelion} { Aphelion } 0.81579 { #Aphelion } { ERadius } 2.34848 { #ERadius } { Radius }7.85714{ #Radius } { OrbitSpeed} 2.04124 { #OrbitSpeed } {Population} 1122{ #Population } {#Planet}\n

match.data:
